item.description: This theme comes with custom background settings which aid in adding photos to your site and making it your own. It has a multi-purpose one page design, a widget designed footer and a blog or news section.

item.title: Typography -> H6 font not works
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
Hi,

in theme settings, there is an added Typography section. However, the option not works when I change the font type for H6 headers. Could you please advise?

Thanks
